title: Efficient and effective removal of toluene from aqueous solution using MIL-100(Fe)
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00503A, Paper

Catalina V. Flores, Juan L. Obeso, Herlys Viltres Cobas, Ricardo A. Peralta, Ilich A. Ibarra, Carolina Leyva
MIL-100(Fe) was employed for the remediation of toluene-contaminated water. MIL-100(Fe) samples synthesised for this work exhibit high thermal (300°C) and chemical (pH range 2-10) stability. Adsorption kinetics and isotherms were...
